text: “Bulchitoonni kaabaa hundii fi warri Siidoonaa hundi achi jiru; isaan warra jabina isaaniitiin goolii uumaa turan taʼan iyyuu warra gorraʼaman wajjin salphinaan gad buʼan. Utuu dhagna hin qabatin warra goraadeedhaan ajjeefaman wajjin ciciisu; warra boolla buʼan wajjinis salphina isaanii baadhatu.
